definition[0]: to make something such as a business, organization etc work more simply and effectively
example[0]: efforts to streamline the production process
definition[1]: to form something into a smooth shape, so that it moves easily through the air or water
example[1]: All these new cars have been streamlined.
definition[2]: to make something such as a business or organization work more simply and effectively
example[2]: Much has been done to streamline the production process.
example[3]: The organization has been streamlined to reduce bureaucracy.
example[4]: Over five hundred jobs were cut in a streamlining operation.
